text:
COOPERATIVE TEST DIVISION
EDUCATIONAL TESTING SERVICE
20 NASSAU STREET, PRINCETON, NEW JERSEY
June 12, 1957
Mr. Ron W. Kostka
National Association of Educational
Broadcasting
Ik Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Kostka:
I have been very interested in reading the March 6, 1957 issue
of Fact Sheet Service, and would like to be placed on your
mailing list for future issues.
If your distribution is not limited to your organization, will
you please notify me of the charge for this service?
Sincerely yours.
Mrs. Marshall P. Smith
Assistant to the Director
AZSidb
